response_data.message: Jagd auf den Bitcoin - Web3 Platform API

response_data.name: Test Bitcoin Hunt Stream
response_data.description: Testing Livepeer integration for Bitcoin hunting platform

response_data.name: Test Bitcoin Hunt Stream

response_data.detail: ('web3.py only accepts checksum addresses. The software that gave you this non-checksum address should be considered unsafe, please file it as a bug on their platform. Try using an ENS name instead. Or, if you must accept lower safety, use Web3.to_checksum_address(lower_case_address).', '0x742d35cc6634c0532925a3b8d0f48bdf4b64fc44')
